name: VR Jurassic Adventure HD
description:
Are you a dinosaur enthusiast, so this game must be very suitable for you. This is a VR dinosaur theme game that integrates leisure, shooting, breeding and other types. The player came to a planet land that was not reclaimed. Here is a group of prehistoric animals that have disappeared on the earth. Here, players can complete various items of the five major scenes of space, shooting, feeding, fighting, and roller coaster. Task, experience the combat, planting and feeding, roller coaster and other content on the planet. Come and help your territory.

Operation method:
Space control:
Turn the left handle left/right
Slotting left handle on the left handle/bottom
Accelerate (hold) right hand trigger
Hanging (holding) the right hand grip
Map menu

Shooting control:
Turn the left handle left/right
Slotting left handle on the left handle/bottom
Fire right handle trigger
Pause menu
Switch the firepower right handle grip key

Feeding control:
Turn the right handle left/right
Move to the right handle left/right
Move the left handle on the left handle/bottom
Various display menu
Cancel the right handle grip key

Fighting control:
Turn the right handle left/right
Move to the right handle left/right
Move the left handle on the left handle/bottom
Attack 1 right handle trigger
Attack 2 (not all) right handle downward

Roller coaster control:
Speed ​​right handle left/right
Pause menu
